stimulusHtml: The seated boxer was created using which of the following techniques?

features.html: Â© Vanni Archive / Art Resource, NY

choicesHtml: Lost-wax casting to mold bronze into a hollow form of the figure
Applying thin sheets of metal to a wooden core carved in the shape of the figure
Molding metal into a solid form in the shape of the figure, then adding enamel
Hammering a sheet of bronze into the shape of the figure, then inlaying gold details
